statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPProject) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Projects that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPProject)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPFolder) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Project-to-Folder relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPProject)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPOrganization) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Project-to-Organization relationships that are out of date.
